thread.title: OTT/MARYLOUISE
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by OTT/MARYLOUISE

author: OTT/MARYLOUISE
title: OTT/MARYLOUISE
text: We just completed 4 1000 piece puzzles - one right after the other - and could not be happier! Now working on the fifth and final one and will then put them away until next Winter. Thank you, White Mountain, for quality puzzles that are challenging and lots of fun.
